briefdescription.para: Enables Motor driver A in Parallel or Normal Mode.

parameterdescription.para: if mode = 1 is passed, motor driver is operated in parallel mode, if mode = 2 is passed, motor driver is operated in normal mode

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if motor driver initialised properly, else it returns ESP_ERR_INVALID_ARG

briefdescription.para: Enables Motor driver B in Parallel or Normal Mode.

parameterdescription.para: if mode = 1 is passed, motor driver is operated in parallel mode, if mode = 2 is passed, motor driver is operated in normal mode

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if motor driver initialised properly, else it returns ESP_ERR_INVALID_ARG

memberdef.argsstring: (int direction, float duty_cycle, mcpwm_unit_t mcpwm_num, mcpwm_timer_t timer_num)
memberdef.name: set_motor_speed_helper

parameterdescription.para: set it as MOTOR_A_0, MOTOR_A_1, MOTOR_B_0, MOTOR_B_1 to select the appropriate motor to set its speed and direction
set is as MOTOR_FORWARD for forward motion, MOTOR_BACKWARD for backward motion, MOTOR_STOP to stop the motor
set the duty cycle of the motor driver PWM

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if speed correctly, ESP_FAIL if any error occurs

briefdescription.para: Reads mode of motor driver A.

simplesect.para: int returns mode of motor driver A, 1 = Parallel mode, 2 = Normal mode

briefdescription.para: Reads mode of motor driver B.

simplesect.para: int returns mode of motor driver B, 1 = Parallel mode, 2 = Normal mode
